titleTag.title: Store Title (Title Tag)
titleTag.description: Enter with the title of your store, this will be use by SEO

metaTagDescription.title: Store Description (Meta Tag Descriptions)
metaTagDescription.description: Enter with a description of your store, this will be use by SEO

gtmId.title: Google Tag Manager
gtmId.description: Enter with the ID (GTM-XXXX) from your Google Tag Manager container if you want to automatically use it
